item.content:encoded:
About Us

  • Home
  • About

History About Funiture

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic

item.content:encoded:
Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia there live the blind texts.

item.title: Single Portfolio
item.dc:creator: user63d3c7fbce3d2
item.content:encoded:
Single Fortfolio

  • Home
  • Single Fortfolio

Minimalis Living room Interior

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country

Client Home Studio

Date November 25, 2020

Category Living Room

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: user63d3c7fbce3d2
item.content:encoded:
Timeless style for timeless generations

Seniors Watches

Welcome! Seniors is a watch store for all budgets offering a range of designer watches as well as a  luxury pre-loved watch section. Take a look around and let us know how you get on! 

Get Started

To celebrate the launch of our website, there is a 10% discount for all watches until April!

Days Hours Minutes Seconds

Follow Us on Social Media

Instagram

Frequently Asked Questions

If you have anymore questions feel free to contact us!

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept a variety of payment methods, including major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express). You can select your preferred payment method at checkout.

Are your watches water-resistant?

Many of our watches are water-resistant to varying degrees. The level of water resistance will be indicated in the product description. Please note that water resistance is not the same as waterproof.

How do I choose the right watch for me?

Choosing the right watch depends on your personal style, budget, and the features that are important to you. Consider factors such as the size of the watch face, the type of band, and the materials used.

How long will it take to receive my order?

Shipping times vary depending on your location and the shipping method selected at checkout. We offer several shipping options to choose from, and estimated delivery times will be provided during the checkout process.

Find Your Perfect Watch Today

Discover the perfect watch for any occasion. Browse our collection today and find a timepiece that complements your style. From classic designs to modern, cutting-edge technology, we've got something for everyone. From classic designs to modern, cutting-edge technology, we've got something for everyone. Click the button below to see more and find your perfect match.

See More

Our Happy Clients!

"Fantastic watch for a really good price . My partner was really happy with his Christmas present"  4.5/5 Diana "Great product and fast shipping. Couldn't recommend enough ."  5/5 Ben "I was looking for a watch for my partner and needed advice. The team was extremely knowledgeable and were able to find the perfect watch for him.I will be recommending ."  5/5 Lily Granger

Style at a competitive price point

Shop all designer watches here !
Shop Now

Style

Find your perfect match with our wide range of watch styles.

Durability

Invest in a watch that stands the test of time.

Price

Get high-quality watches at affordable prices.

Technology

Stay connected and track your fitness with our advanced features.

item.title: Elementor #2534
item.dc:creator: jakesenior
item.content:encoded:
Preowned collection

Welcome to our Preowned watch selection!

This is the place to find some of the most famous watch brands such as Rolex , Omega , Brietling ,Audemars piquet and others for the lowest prices on the web

We acquire these pieces from trusted individuals and only stock the best quality peices so you can be sure you are buying only the best

To ensure this each piece is harshly inspected by a professional to ensure these pieces are firstly authentic as well in the best condition ensuring there are no pesky nics dents or deep scratches. However please note that these are mostly pre-loved pieces so there will be some signs of wear which we will explicitly point out in the description and images of the watch.

If you would like to sell or consign a piece to us please refer to the CONTACT page and send us through some details and images of your watch

If we do not stock a watch you are looking for please contact us so we can source this specific piece for you !

Welcome to our Preowned watch selection!<\/strong><\/p>

This is the place to find some of the most famous watch brands such as Rolex , Omega , Brietling ,Audemars piquet and others for the lowest prices on the web\u00a0<\/p>

We acquire these pieces from trusted individuals and only stock the best quality peices so you can be sure you are buying only the best\u00a0<\/p>

To ensure this each piece is harshly inspected by a professional to ensure these pieces are firstly authentic as well in the best condition ensuring there are no pesky nics dents or deep scratches. However please note that these are mostly pre-loved pieces so there will be some signs of wear which we will explicitly point out in the description and images of the watch.<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

If you would like to sell or consign a piece to us please refer to the CONTACT page and send us through some details and images of your watch\u00a0<\/p>

item.title: Contact

item.content:encoded:
Do you want to sell your watch?

We are extremely interested in buying in a range of luxury watches from our clients including Rolex, Omega, Brietling, Paneria and many more. If you are interested in getting a price for your watch please reach out to us!

  • Thornes lane wharf, WF1 5RF
  • support@seniorswatches.com
  • 07793488992
  • 07939862015

Ask Your Queries

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: user63d3c7fbce3d2
item.content:encoded:
About Us

This page shares our story as well as all our services we offer. If we have left a stone unturned please reach out

We Are Your Favourite, Online Watch Store.

At Seniors we have the philosophy that loyalty is earnt. That's why we strive to do the best by our clients. with fast shipping. Almost instant responses to your inquiries and competitive prices. In addition to this the more loyal the client, the greater the lengths we will go to make sure you have a good shopping experience. For example a valued client of our's partner wanted to get him a watch celebrate their anniversary. So the founder personally delivered the watch to congratulate them.

Keep in touch

Please make an account so you can be informed when new stock has arrived. We sell out quick!

Returns

Don't worry about buying an item you don't like. We allow returns up to 2 weeks of arrival (Unworn condition)

Delivery

At Seniors we give you a luxury buying experience therefore we believe you should not have to worry about shipping options. Its on us!

Have a watch to sell?

Want to sell your watch? messages to arrange a live consultation with the founder of Seniors

Get Best Offers On Our Watches!

Get Started

Our History

Past

Seniors was founded by a young entrepreneur ,Jake Senior. He was fascinated with watches and the history of them which allowed him to have a very extensive knowledge of watches. He then worked for the biggest names in the UK selling watches ,but believed he could deliver a much more luxury experience himself so he set up Seniors watches. Jake purposely attached His name to the company so clients will feel more at ease.

Present

Since this point the Company is growing faster than ever due to the Senior's team expanding with More than capable sales consultants, software engineers and digital marketers. This is why we are expanding the business into more sectors such as our preowned range where we source preloved luxury watches such as Rolex, Omega Brietling, Tag Heuer and more. In order to supply our clients with the best watch craftsmanship this world has to offer at such a low price point.

Best Quality Watches for ...

  • Personal Gifts
  • Celebrations
  • Corporate Gifts
  • Couple Watches
  • Wedding Package
  • Graduation's
Looking for a watch but aren't sure what is the right fit?

We can absolutely help you with this as we have a trained team to tailor the best watch for you, a loved one or a friend for any occasion. If you would like this service please contact us with information like

Who is it for?

Is it for any special occasions?

Hobbies ?

Daily style?

Any we will contact you to find out the best time for you!

Looking for his and hers watches?

Have two watches in your cart? There’s a discount code for that. Keep it on the hush but enter “Love2” for 10% off your cart

UK wide shipping

Unfortunately we only ship to the UK at this current time but we a looking to expand. Subscribe to be notified!

Best Quality

All watches go under rigorous testing and inspections to make sure they are in the best condition for our clients

Best Offers

One of the most competitive Watch companies in the business. Take a look around and find out for yourself

Secure Payments

We work with the best payment processors to make sure your payments are secure

item.title: Emporio Armani Black Dial Dress Watch 42mm
item.dc:creator: geeodgers
item.content:encoded: Emporio Armani Mens dress watch black dial 42mm. Emporio Armani, established in 1975 Milan Italy, is considered by many as the king in fashion competing with local brands, such as Gucci. Armani has an avantgarde take on their watch design language and is intended to be dressed up and down with either a suit or streetwear. Specification: Brand:Emporio Armani Diameter: 42MM Case material: Stainless Steel Strap material:Stainless steel Warranty: 1 year seniors warranty Movement: Quartz Water resistance:50M

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Bought this watch as I had a leavers ball to attend. looked stunning. very happy!

Hugo Boss, being a high end fashion brand, brings a lot to the table in the watch world with extreme precision as well as modern elegant design language. In addition to this the brand also supplies a plethora of watch complications to meet your needs in a watch! Specification: Brand: Hugo Boss Diameter: 36MM Case material: Stainless Steel Strap material:Stainless steel Warranty: 1 year seniors warranty Movement: Quartz Water resistance: 100M

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: my boyfriend bought me this watch as an anniversary gift. 10/10
can't thank this site enough. was able to pick up this watch at a steal price on the opening week. and its already here!
